modules.title: Good Listener, Good Leader
modules.prompt: Keep a one-day communication log and list three listening techniques you used. What changed when you applied them?

modules.title: The Five-Minute Speech
modules.instructions: Draft a 5-minute talk (outline + key cards). Record a practice run and upload notes or video. Aim for a story-hook, clear body, and memorable close.

modules.title: Teach or Pitch

modules.title: Lead a Small-Group Discussion
modules.instructions: Plan and moderate a 10–15 min group discussion (topic, ground rules, timekeeping). Submit agenda + brief outcomes.

quiz.q: Name two situations best suited to a formal letter.

quiz.a: Clarity, tone, grammar affect how your message is received and your professionalism.
